class.name: zccp_msg
class.title: ZeroMQ Command & Control Protocol
class.grammar:
ZCCP = greeting traffic signoff
greeting = C:HELLO S:HELLO-OK
traffic = C:SUBSCRIBE / C:PUBLISH / C:DIRECT / S:DELIVER
signoff = C:GOODBYE S:GOODBYE-OK
class.message: Client greets the server and provides its identifier. Client identifier Client properties
Client subscribes to some set of messages Regular expression Subscription options
Client publishes a message to the server Destination routing key Content header fields Content, as multipart message
Client sends a message to a specific client Destination client identifier Content header fields Content, as multipart message
Server delivers a message to client Originating client Destination address Content header fields Content, as multipart message
Server confirms client signoff Session statistics
Client or server pings the other party
Client sent a message that was not valid at this time
